items.title: The Art Therapy Master Class - Using Music to Heal & Thrive
items.headline: Learn fool-proof methods you can start using today to relieve pain and cure illnesses using art instead of meds
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, students will have a complete understanding of what working as a music therapist entails: requirements, applications, lifestyle, wage and more.
Students will walk away with customized techniques that will allow them to influence themselves and change their state in a heartbeat.
Students will learn skills that will allow them to create change in people through music. We've simplified them so that they will be able to apply these skills in real-life situations right away.
